title: Request for Body Cam Footage of Incident Involving Maguire Marie Mclaughlin

communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Florida Sunshine Law, I hereby request the following records:

I am writing to formally request access to the bodycam footage under the Freedom of Information Act (FOIA) related to the arrest of Maguire Marie Mclaughlin.

Incident Details for Footage Retrieval:
Location: McDonald's, 20th Street, Vero Beach, Florida
Suspect: Maguire Marie Mclaughlin, 19
Incident Summary: Deputies responded to reports of an irate woman at the McDonald’s drive-thru around 4 a.m. Witnesses stated that Mclaughlin became disorderly after being told she would need to pay for additional dipping sauces. She allegedly made threats and was observed with signs of intoxication. When officers attempted to arrest her, she initially resisted but was eventually taken into custody and charged with disorderly conduct and resisting arrest.

I am requesting copies of all body-worn camera footage from officers who responded to this incident.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 10 business days.

Sincerely,

Harun

title: Request for Body Cam Footage of Incident Involving Alexandria 09/18/2022

communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Florida Sunshine Law, I hereby request the following records:

I am writing to formally request access to the bodycam footage under the Freedom of Information Act (FOIA) related to the arrest of a woman identified as Alexandria on 09/18/2022.

Incident Details for Footage Retrieval:
Date: 09/18/2022
Location: Maitland, Florida
Suspect: Alexandria
Incident Summary: Alexandria was involved in a dispute with her father regarding transportation. When officers arrived, they attempted to reason with her, explaining that her father was not obligated to drive her. Despite multiple requests to exit the vehicle, Alexandria refused and was eventually removed from the car and placed under arrest. During the encounter, she made allegations against the officers and resisted arrest before being taken into custody.

I am requesting copies of all body-worn camera footage from officers who responded to this incident.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 10 business days.

Sincerely,

Harun

title: Request for Body Cam Footage of Incident on April 21, 2023

communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Florida Sunshine Law, I hereby request the following records:

I am writing to formally request access to the bodycam footage under the Freedom of Information Act (FOIA) related to the arrest of Jessica Reid on April 21, 2023.

Incident Details for Footage Retrieval:
Date: April 21, 2023
Location: Palm Beach Gardens, Florida
Suspect: Jessica Reid, 37
Incident Summary: Jessica Reid was involved in a vehicle crash while driving a Bentley. Responding officers reported signs of impairment and attempted to detain her after she resisted instructions. During the encounter, Reid allegedly refused to comply with orders, used profane language, and attempted to walk away from officers. She was later arrested and charged with DUI with property damage, multiple counts of resisting an officer, refusal to submit to a DUI test, and refusal to sign a citation. Additional charges, including battery and obstructing an officer without violence, were added in September.

I am requesting copies of all body-worn camera footage from officers who responded to this incident.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 10 business days.

Sincerely,

Harun

title: Request for Body Cam Footage of Incident on 06/04/2022

communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Florida Sunshine Law, I hereby request the following records:

I am writing to formally request access to the bodycam footage under the Freedom of Information Act (FOIA) related to the arrest of Laura Gallagher on 06/04/2022.

Incident Details for Footage Retrieval:
Date: 06/04/2022
Location: Daytona Beach, Florida
Suspect: Laura Gallagher, 43
Incident Summary: Laura Gallagher was removed from a bar following an altercation involving a 17-year-old employee. She was later taken into custody after engaging in a dispute with officers regarding her level of intoxication and ability to drive. During the encounter, Gallagher made various statements about law enforcement, resisted instructions, and was ultimately charged with battery on an officer, driving under the influence, disorderly intoxication, and resisting an officer’s commands.

I am requesting copies of all body-worn camera footage from officers who responded to this incident.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 10 business days.

Sincerely,

Harun

title: Request for Body Cam Footage of Incident 06/10/2022

communications.subject: Florida Sunshine Law Request: Request for Body Cam Footage of Incident 06/10/2022
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Florida Sunshine Law, I hereby request the following records:

I am writing to formally request access to the bodycam footage under the Freedom of Information Act (FOIA) related to the arrest of Ashley Anderson on Clearwater Beach in 06/10/2022

Incident Details for Footage Retrieval:

Date: 06/10/2022
Location: Clearwater Beach, Pinellas County, Florida
Suspect: Ashley Anderson, 21
Incident Summary: Ashley Anderson was arrested for disorderly intoxication following a physical altercation with a family on the beach. She allegedly shoved a woman and engaged in a verbal confrontation, causing a disturbance. Officers placed her in handcuffs and escorted her to a police vehicle, where she continued to yell, insult officers, and kick the car door. She was later transported to Pinellas County Jail.

I request the following:
Bodycam footage from the officers who interacted with and arrested Ashley Anderson.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 10 business days.

Sincerely,

Harun
